1_1PnCqnnZscQNPpRmHHZ7UfBpv2oZoqejMB.body:
Yeah, all site can work even without Internet using alternative communication: Wifi direct (wifi without router), Bluetooth, Meshnet, Radio communication, etc.
It requires to add peer discover over these networks, but nothing major changes.
